Title: Change Status
Description:
As a user
I want to be able change the status of my user stories
So that I can update the status of a user story

Acceptance criteria
Given that I can choose to change the status of a user story
When I click the change status button
Then I should be able to give the user story a new status

Title: Expanded View
Description:
As a user
I want to be able see further information about a specific user story
So that I can view more details that could not be shown on the overview

Acceptance criteria
Given that I get taken to a different page
When I click a user story
Then I can see all the information about that user story

Title: Add User Story
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to add a user story
So that I can make more user stories

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I can choose to add a user story
When I click the add button on a user story
Then I should be able to create a new user story and add it to the list

Title: Minimal Viability
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to view the list of user stories
So that I can manage my user stories

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I access the website
When I view the website
Then I should be able to view the list of user stories

Title: Delete User Story
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to delete a user story
So that I can manage my user stories

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I can choose to delete a user story
When I click the delete button on a user story
Then the user story should be removed from the list

Title: Edit User Story
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to edit a user story
So that I can manage my user stories

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I can choose to edit a user story
When I click the edit button on a user story
Then I can change the title or description of the user story

Title: GUI Cards
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to view the list of user stories in a better way
So that I can tell the stories apart

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I access the website
When I view the website
Then I should be able to view the list of user stories as a readable list of different stories

Title: Assign users
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to assign a user to a user story
So that I can manage who does what

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I can add a user to a specific user story
When I click the assign button on a user story an choose a person
Then I can see who is assigned to the user story

Title: Change Colour
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to change colour of a user story
So that I easily tell them apart

Acceptance criteria:
Given that I can edit the color
When I change it in the edit page
Then I can see the color on the user stories page

Title: Due Date
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to give my user story a due date 
So that I can schedule my user stories 

Acceptance criteria 
Given that I can set a due date for my user stories 
When I give them a due date on creation or edit 
Then the user story should be set to be due on a specific date

Title: Drag 'n' Drop
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to drag and drop user stories into the right state
So that I can update the state of a user story

Acceptance Criteria:
Given that user can drag and drop an user story from one category to another

Title: Bug Fixes
Description:
As a user
I want to be able to view a page full of Bug reports
So that I can see the title, the description of the bug and if it has been solved

Title: Login
Description:
As a user 
I want to be able to login to the website
So that I assign certain users to user stories

Acceptance criteria
Given that there is a login system and I have registered on the website
when I login I should be able to see that I am logged in

Title: Backlog
Description:
As a user 
I want to have a page for my user stories in the back log
So that I can keep track of them and decide which ones to move to a sprint

Acceptance criteria 
Given that I get taken to a different page 
When I click the backlog tab
Then I can find all my backlogged user stories
